title: 93/417/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 June 1993 amending the Decision on the Liaison Group on the Elderly
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 21 June 1993 amending the Decision on the Liaison Group on the Elderly
(93/417/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Economic Community,
Whereas it is necessary to adapt membership of the Group in the light of developments at Community level,
main_body: This decision shall take effect on 21 June 1993.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 June 1993.
For the Commission
Padraig FLYNN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 296, 26. 10. 1991, p. 42.
